kidsQuest.title: ü¶Å Little Explorer's Journey Through Zimbabwe
kidsQuest.description: Join Simba the Lion on a fun adventure to discover Zimbabwe's amazing culture!

questNarrative.introduction: Hi there, little explorer! I'm Simba the Lion, and I'm here to take you on the most amazing adventure through Zimbabwe! We'll discover special animals, meet wonderful families, taste delicious food, dance to beautiful music, learn about kindness, and celebrate together! Are you ready for this magical journey?
progressEncouragement: Simba is so proud of you!
You're becoming a Zimbabwe culture expert!
questNarrative.completion: WOW! You did it, little explorer! You've learned so much about Zimbabwe's wonderful culture. Simba is so proud of you! You now know about special family animals, loving families, delicious food, beautiful music, helping others, and fun celebrations. You're ready to share all these amazing things with your own family and friends!

milestones.title: Meet the Animal Families
milestones.celebrationMessage: Roar! You found your family animal! Simba is so excited!
milestones.unlockMessage: Let's learn about the special animals that represent families in Zimbabwe!

milestones.title: My Big, Loving Family
milestones.description: Meet all the wonderful people in your family!
milestones.celebrationMessage: Amazing! You know your whole family tree! Families are so special!
milestones.unlockMessage: Now let's meet all the special people who love you!

milestones.title: Sharing Makes Friends
milestones.description: Learn about yummy food and sharing!
milestones.celebrationMessage: Delicious! You learned about sharing food! That's so kind!
milestones.unlockMessage: Let's cook and share delicious Zimbabwe food together!

milestones.title: Music and Dancing Fun
milestones.celebrationMessage: You're a wonderful musician and dancer! Music makes everyone happy!
milestones.unlockMessage: Time to make beautiful music and dance together!

milestones.title: Being Kind and Helpful
milestones.description: Learn about helping and being kind!
milestones.celebrationMessage: You have such a kind heart! Helping others makes everyone smile!
milestones.unlockMessage: Let's learn about being kind and helping others!

milestones.title: Celebration Time!
milestones.celebrationMessage: Party time! You know how to make celebrations special!
milestones.unlockMessage: Let's celebrate all the wonderful things in life!

rewards.description: A beautiful sticker of your lion family
A special coloring page of your family tree
A simple recipe to make with grown-ups
Instructions to make fun instruments at home
A chart to track your kind deeds
A special certificate showing you completed the journey!

specialActivities.title: Animal Sound Symphony
specialActivities.description: Make music with all the animal sounds you learned!

specialActivities.title: Family Photo Gallery
specialActivities.description: Create a gallery of family photos with Shona names!

specialActivities.title: Little Chef Cooking Show
specialActivities.description: Put on a pretend cooking show making Zimbabwe food!

specialActivities.title: Zimbabwe Family Band
specialActivities.description: Start a family band with your homemade instruments!

specialActivities.title: Kindness Heroes
specialActivities.description: Become a kindness hero by helping others every day!

specialActivities.title: Family Celebration Planner
specialActivities.description: Help plan the next family celebration!

tips: Encourage your child to share what they learned with family members
Practice the greetings and vocabulary words together
Help them make the craft activities for real
Sing the songs together as a family
Ask them to teach you about their family animal
extendedLearning: Visit a local African cultural center or museum
Look up Zimbabwe on a map together
Try cooking simple Zimbabwe dishes as a family
Connect with Zimbabwe families in your community
